thread.title: House of the Week: Milton gem overlooks a ravine
thread.title_full: House of the Week: Milton gem overlooks a ravine

author: stevepecar
title: House of the Week: Milton gem overlooks a ravine
text:
This place : One-of-a-kind home is a masterpiece of luxury and design
Price : $2,688,000
Address : 335 Britton Crescent
Neighbourhood : South Milton
Bedrooms : Four + two
Bathrooms : Five
Lot Dimensions : 35.15 feet by 117.52 feet
Taxes : $6,584
Features: Located in south Milton near the Oakville border, this one-of-a-kind home is a masterpiece of luxury and design, customized with exquisite details and top-tier finishes throughout.
Nestled on a quiet, private street, the property features an oversized pie-shaped lot backing onto a ravine, that offers privacy and serene views.
The main level is ideal for entertaining, with 10-ft ceilings and a custom Bloomsbury kitchen equipped with high-end appliances, including two Bosch dishwashers, a Miele espresso machine and convection oven, a six-burner Wolf gas stove, a Sub-Zero fridge, freezer, and wine fridge. At the heart of the kitchen is a stunning 10-ft marble island with a built-in wine trough, ideal for hosting gatherings.
Custom European 9-ft French doors open to a spacious deck, overlooking a lush greenspace that connects you to nature.
Upstairs, the second level features 9-ft ceilings, five bedrooms, and three beautifully appointed bathrooms, each with glass showers and elegant tile work. The primary suite includes a luxurious dressing room, formerly the fifth bedroom, adding to its sophisticated charm.
The fully finished walk-out basement expands the home functionality, with a great room, gym, studio, and four storage areas, leading to a large, pool-sized backyard facing south and overlooking the conservation area.
Located near major highways, schools, shopping, and amenities, this home combines prime location with luxury.
Thanks to Sam McDadi Real Estate Inc. Brokerage for all the information about the House of the Week. For more information about this house, please visit Sam McDadi Real Estate Inc.
